tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE green_buildings_air_quality_measurements (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measurement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  co2_level DECIMAL,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Green_Building_Air_Quality_Measurements (
    measurement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    CO2_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE Green_Building_Details (
    building_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    year_built INT,
    building_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE IndoorAirQualityMeasurements (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    co2_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(255),
    room_type VARCHAR(255),
    building_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
);
